Articles.Content: \*continues to try and think,then gets a splitting headache\* I think I need to rest...

> 
> Great job, Vincent. Have you collected any data on the Krynns?
> I have. Primary structure is composed of: Quadllneutronium. Weaponry is unknown. Propulsion is grav-
> 
> Hold... Did you say Quadllneutronium...?
> 
> This might be a challenge...

But Kinemet is just as strong and is more lightweight...

- - - Updated - - -

Meanwhile, I am skimming the event horizon of the black hole
Bye, Laythe! ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

Gravity based propulsion, carrying the vessel through space at 79x C. Scanning for armaments...

This will not end well...

- - - Updated - - -

> 
> But Kinemet is just as strong and is more lightweight...

[Hahaha that's funny]
But it is......

\*Xannari receives a written message from Sampa\*

Hey, I was scanning the frequencies, I came across this communication from one of the ships, they are planning on hitting the Citadel.

Sampa
I am just about to enter the black hole when a ship comes into view. It's about the size of Ceres.

> 
> But it is......

How much force can it survive? Name in energy, or Newtons. [Kilo, mega, giga, tera, peta, ect]

A tractor beam encompasses my ship, and I am pulled away from the black hole

- - - Updated - - -

> 
> How much force can it survive? Name in energy, or Newtons. [Kilo, mega, giga, tera, peta, ect]

27 petanewtons is all I could test, but I'm sure it could survive more.

- - - Updated - - -

Also, Kinemet-427 is highly unstable and can be used in a warhead.

> 
> \*Xannari receives a written message from Sampa\*
> Hey, I was scanning the frequencies, I came across this communication from one of the ships, they are planning on hitting the Citadel.
> 
> Sampa

Really? Well, we're far enough away to where we can make a plan. We only have a few hours though, but the problem is you aren't fast enough. With permission, I'd like to go see about a few modifications. I'll let you talk with Vincent about the planning.

I am pulled aboard the ship. It's color seems to change and swirl strangely.

- - - Updated - - -

My capsule is sealed in a room, and my capsule's sensors read an abnormally high amount of neutrinos.

- - - Updated - - -

I attempt to send a signal, but it just rebounds throughout the room, and I receive my own message.

> 
> 27 petanewtons is all I could test, but I'm sure it could survive more.

[Puny. Quadllneutronium can survive the impact of 2 full Brontojoules of energy, or about 16 Brontonewtons. [10^27]]

Well, I don't have an accelerator that big. Maybe if I borrowed yours.....

- - - Updated - - -

Anyway, I've been captured by the massive alien ship

- - - Updated - - -

I'm still insane

- - - Updated - - -

Anyone on?
(Sorry, was in an orientation)

Uhh... still drowning in diplomats.

- - - Updated - - -

also, POST 1000! HUGE MILESTONE! If i REALLY wanted to make a borg pun, I would have said Hugh milestone

> 
> also, POST 1000! HUGE MILESTONE! If i REALLY wanted to make a borg pun, I would have said Hugh milestone

[...........................]

> 
> If i REALLY wanted to make a borg pun, I would have said ***Hugh*** milestone

[...........................]

- - - Updated - - -

> 
> I would have said ***Hugh*** milestone

[...........................]

(Lol, speaking of milestone, i finally got out of my general class at my aircraft mechanic school and am moving onto my first powerplant class! Unfortunately, i will be less active during the day because of this.)

> 
> You must now rescue me from the aliens

um...let me return to the Citadel and board my flagship, Eternal
[i'm off watching a stream right now. Come on down if you want [http://www.twitch.tv/Thunder_86\]](http://www.twitch.tv/Thunder_86%5D)

> 
> Really? Well, we're far enough away to where we can make a plan. We only have a few hours though, but the problem is you aren't fast enough. With permission, I'd like to go see about a few modifications. I'll let you talk with Vincent about the planning.

Roger that...

- - - Updated - - -

I seriously just saw that response...

I'm going to hack my pod's shields to force open this box.

- - - Updated - - -

It worked! I'm free!

Uh Oh.....

Mayday! Mayday! I have 3 unknown fighters on my trail!

Fuel 23%

Sheilds 14%

Insanity 200%

- - - Updated - - -

Wha-- they're gonna ----- [END OF TRANSMISSION]
Laythe? LAYTHE! Come on! Xannari. Vincent, did you get a lock on his last known coordinates?

[Okay, I'm good]

Last known gridmark was 5a. I cannot specify anymore due to electrodynamic interference.

Hold on, guys! \*Grunt\* I'll have this... Up... in no time! God this thing is heavy!

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-15T01:05:02Z" title="07/15/2015 01:05  AM" data-short="8 yr">July 15, 2015</time> by Xannari Ferrows**

> 
> [Okay, I'm good]
> Last known gridmark was 5a. I cannot specify anymore due to electrodynamic interference.
> 
> Hold on, guys! \*Grunt\* I'll have this... Up... in no time! God this thing is heavy!

Ok,take the time you need! We're the closest ship to those coordinates. Changing course. Hope this light cruiser has enough firepower to save him...if we get there in time...

- - - Updated - - -

Vincent, go back and help xannari out with that upgrade.
